Detailed Description

Flow Parameters structure holds all 'generic' parameters for flow calculations

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FlowParameters::FlowParameters (  )  [inline]

Member Data Documentation

float FlowParameters::diffusion_alpha

Strength of diffusion tensor.
Default: 5.0

float FlowParameters::diffusion_q

paramter todo.
Default: 0.5

float FlowParameters::diffusion_sigma

Amount of smoothing before calculating edges.
Default: 2.0

bool FlowParameters::diffusion_tensor

Flag if diffusion tensor is calculated and used as g-weighting.
Default: TRUE

float FlowParameters::gauss_tv_epsilon

Parameter for gauss TV that modells the strength of the 'gaussification'.
Default: 0.01

float FlowParameters::lambda

Amount of weighting for optical flow constraint against regularization.
Default: 50.0

bool FlowParameters::median_filter

Flag if flow fields are median filtered after upscaling.
Default: TRUE

unsigned int FlowParameters::num_images

Usually 2 or 3 frames used for flow calculations.

unsigned int FlowParameters::num_iter

Number of iterations per warping step.
Default: 10

size_t FlowParameters::num_scales

Number of used scales.
Default: MAX_PYRAMIDAL_LEVELS -- auotmatically determined due to scale factor.
This variable effects initialization of input data!

unsigned int FlowParameters::num_warps

Number of warps.
Default: 5

float FlowParameters::scale_factor

Scale factor from one level to the next.
Default: 0.5
This variable effects initialization of input data!

CudaFlowLib::FilterMethod_t FlowParameters::str_tex_filter_method

Filter method for generating str.-tex. decomposed image.
Default: STR_TEX_LAPLACE (fastest)
This variable effects initialization of input data!

float FlowParameters::str_tex_smoothing

Amount of denoising for building structure texture decomposed image.
Default: 1.0 (for ROF use 10.0!)

float FlowParameters::str_tex_weight

Proportion of structure towards texture.
Default: 0.8

bool FlowParameters::texture_rescale

Uses textures to rescale buffers.
Default: FALSE
This variable effects initialization of input data!

float FlowParameters::theta

Pushes the approximation of u/v towards real u/v in the optimization scheme.
Default: 0.1

CudaFlowLib::WarpDirection_t FlowParameters::warp_direction

Warping direction for flow calculations.
Default: BACKWARD
